Uses of Class
tilt.handler.post.Options

  • Packages that use Options 
    Package Description
    tilt.image
    This package handles everything directly related to the manipulation of images, and preparing them for text-to-image linking.
    tilt.image.matchup
    Matching up fragments of lines in adjacent columns
    tilt.image.page
    The purpose of this package is to represent the visually identified parts of the page: the lines and word-shapes.
